title: Artist Spotlight: Pindar Van Arman and his Ai Canvas Painting Robots
description: Pindar talks to Kevin about his AI process, including the introduction of feedback loops. He touches on his feeling around imposter syndrome in the digital AI world and early influences from the earlier "digital art brat pack."
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
itunes:summary: Pindar talks to Kevin about his AI process, including the introduction of feedback loops. He touches on his feeling around imposter syndrome in the digital AI world and early influences from the earlier "digital art brat pack."
